sentences.en: AIM : To verify the role of a synthetic peptide in neutralizing endotoxins.
sentences.cn: 目的: 检验一条合成肽在中和内毒素活性方面的作用.

sentences.en: American forces will remain to verify compliance with the treaty.
sentences.cn: 美军将继续驻留，核查条约是否得到遵守。

sentences.en: CNN could not independently verify whether Lee worked with Jackson.
sentences.cn: CNN不能独自证实李是否为杰克工作过.

sentences.en: Do you know what I'm talking about when I say Operation Verify?
sentences.cn: 我说行动确认,你懂我在说什么 吗 ?

sentences.en: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.cn: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

sentences.en: I had my nose out the window to verify a sneeze hypothesis!
sentences.cn: 我到窗外去闻一下是不是有打喷嚏的可能!

sentences.en: I have been hunting through all sorts of books to verify this.
sentences.cn: 我查了好多书来核实这一点.

sentences.en: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.cn: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.en: In this simple example we may verify the result readily by analyzing the network.
sentences.cn: 对于这个简单的例子,我们通过分析网络可以很容易验证其结果的正确性.

sentences.en: Men were sent out to verify whether it was true.
sentences.cn: 几个人被派去查清事实.

sentences.en: Pay by Wire Transfer and verify your company bank information.
sentences.cn: 用银行电汇方式支付,并确认贵公司的银行资料.

sentences.en: People began verify their scientific hypotheses by stringent tests.
sentences.cn: 人们开始用精确的试验证实自己的科学假说.

sentences.en: Select 3 machines and verify records for parameter setup and monitoring.
sentences.cn: 选择3台和验证的参数设置和监测记录.

sentences.en: The bank's responsibility is to verify that the explorer's documents conform to the letter of credit.
sentences.cn: 银行的责任在于查核出口商的单据必须与信用证的一致.

sentences.en: They now take extra steps to verify the creditworthiness of customers.
sentences.cn: 他们现在又采取额外措施来核实客户的信用度。

sentences.en: To verify Restaurant Cashier's receipts against machine tape readings.
sentences.cn: 核对餐厅收银发票和收银机上显示的金额是否一致.

sentences.en: Verification was cancelled. Rerun Data collection and then click Verify again.
sentences.cn: 验证已被取消.请重新运行数据收集,然后再次单击“验证”.

sentences.en: You can easily verify these conclusions if you happen to have a piece of polaroid.
sentences.cn: 如果你手头有一片偏振片,就容易证实上面这些结论.

words.tran_cn: 可证实的；能作证的；可检验的

trans.tran_en: to discover whether something is correct or true
to discover whether something is correct or true
